1.Description:
Looking for a treat? You‚Äôve come to the right place - because we‚Äôve got something special for you! We‚Äôre hosting a brand-new Halloween game jam open to developers worldwide, with a special focus on European creativity.
Source: dev forum

2.Description: inspire is an event in the sumer with workshops folowed by an game jam at the end

3.Description: the developer chalange always is a weekend in february the time to show off your skills by making a game in one weekend

4.Description:

Source: dev forum

6.Description:
a yearly development competition gathering the whole world to create the most amazing Roblox experiences based on a theme!
Source: dev forum

mostly run a weekend in february the time to show off your skills and make a game in one weekend

7.Description: connect is an events with diferent work shops and a game jam at the end its called inspire now

8.Description:
Welcome to the Roblox Developer Challenge, a yearly development competition gathering the whole world to create the most amazing Roblox experiences based on a theme!
Source: dev forum

9.Description:
developers will have ten days to create an experience based on the theme, when it‚Äôs announced on March 4th, 2022. Remember, you do not have to spend the full 10 days working on this - take as much or as little time as you‚Äôd like! After, there will be a short period of two weeks to allow our judging panel to select the top ten experiences! At this point, a vote will open where everyone will have the chance to vote on their favorite experiences!

After the community vote, the winning teams will have the opportunity to refine, update, and make ANY changes to their experiences that they deem necessary. These changes must be made AND published by April 12th at 11:59 PM PST.

After another week of review by our panel of judges, the top three experiences will be announced! These will be the first, second, and third place winners of the Roblox Developer Dream Jam!
Source: Dev forum |

this a game jam with diferent rounds with semi finals etc

Boing bam zap pow! Anoxia Collective presents Firewall 3D: the coolest, wackiest, most radical adventure this side of the milky way! Fight off hordes of enemies with your trusty wrench to save the civilians of this digital simulation! Guess what? It runs in spectacular THREE DIMENSIONS!

gameData.title: [üíÄ] Nameless
gameData.description:
i didn‚Äôt come here to hunt monsters. i came because nobody else would believe me.

in old churches across europe, they weren‚Äôt praying‚Ä¶ they were hiding something. creatures from forgotten legends. and when people stopped saying their names, the monsters woke up.

they sent me in with nothing but a candle. no weapons, no map ‚Äî just a warning: ‚Äúif you forget its name, you‚Äôre already dead.‚Äù

turns out they were right.

the letters of its name are still here, scattered through the catacombs. but you only see them when you‚Äôre holding a candle. no light, no name. no name‚Ä¶ no escape.

find the letters. remember its name. place the candle on the right altar.

just don‚Äôt let the candle die.
and don‚Äôt let it whisper your name first.

Developed by: 
- @mrshadyman274 aka zonder
- @submerso106
- @RocketWaves_Dev
- @lelaleo

gameData.title: üéÉüé∂ MONSTER MASH - EUROJAM 2025
gameData.description:
Maya Alto is a regular girl who noticed the spark of Halloween is dimming away, and the only way to bring life to it is to follow her magical broom around Europe and meet up with strangers that might help her along the way!

A 2 key rhythm game that will make you tap your feet into the rhythm! Meet monsters that will guide you along to revive the spirit of the Spooktober Festival! Deep storyline, quick and easy to follow gameplay, unique character and icons, custom artwork!

- Story and gameplay by BillMoney123
- Artwork and UI by Cliosow
- Charting and building by Derpario
- Scripting by TenebrisNoctua

(This game is a submission for the EuroJam 2025 Challenge!)

gameData.title: Secrets of the Skies [Inspire 2025]
JETLAG (ROBLOX Inspire 2025) (ü•â3RD CREATIVE)
gameData.description:
Get ready for nothing like before runner game where every step counts! Dash through busy streets filled with obstacles like manholes, strangers, and roadblocks. But beware ‚Äî you must stay awake and function well, or it‚Äôs game over!

üîåPlug your power cord into the correct outlet to function well through tricky roadblocks. Keep your plug connected in the right lane to keep running and avoid losing!
üëã Spot friends on the right or left? Give them a high-five with the matching arm to boost your morale and keep your pace. Raise the right hand in the right spot to progress!

(This game is a submission for the Roblox Inspire 2025 Challenge and received 3rd place in the most creative game concept!ü•â)

gameData.title: Spatulicious
gameData.description:
Welcome to Spatulicious! You have just been hired by a shady food truck franchise located across Robloxia, and you've only been provided with one tool for all your tasks - your trusty Spatula. 

Each day you are tasked with reaching a certain amount of points to continue. Serve customers and clean up messes to increase your points. If your cooking is lackluster, you might be faced with an angry customer or the dreaded health inspector! You can also use your spatula to take care of these threats to your business.

Developed in 4 days for the Connect Game Jam 2025 by Wracked Games

gameData.title: Goggle Gambit (Inspire 2025)
gameData.description:
This game did not win anything in the Inspire challenge but idc i think i made a cool game

This is a puzzle platformer that lets you view the world through different colored lenses through your special goggles. Each lens provides a different bonus, so use them to your advantage.

Every puzzle is possible. Seriously. I dont need anyone complaining

This game was intended to be placed on PC. Although it technically is possible on mobile and tablet devices, it will be a lot more difficult

This was made for the Inspire 2025 Challenge. The theme was: One tool, many uses. This was made in 2 days because I epically joined late.

gameData.title: Painted Figures - Roblox Inspire Challenge 2025
gameData.description:
Decades ago, your brother sent you a letter. You were not ready to open it then. But as you go through it now... should you have read it all those years ago?

This game is my submission for the 2025 Inspire Challenge. I am a solo dev, sorry in advance if the game is a tad laggy.

It was made on a road trip, in a laundromat, and I occasionally used gas station wifi. It has been a crazy three days, but I wanted to participate in this challenge, and I appreciate the support.

known has a "BRICK."

Are YOU Resourseful enough to escape the clutches of the sinister BRICKLER, or  will you too fall, like a house of ca-... bricks...

Made in under 86 hours for the ROBLOX 2025 Inspire Challenge.

This game tells the story of a character reminiscing about his past with his guitar. In these memories, he faces off against NoteMan, an opponent who wields summoned notes and various tools. In contrast, the main character relies solely on his guitar to overcome every challenge, embodying the theme ‚Äúone tool, many uses.‚Äù

Roblox Inspire 2025

gameData.title: Plugged In [Inspire 2025]
gameData.description:
-Story-
You were working on a courier ship, usual routine, but unusual weather managed to flip over the boat. You drift above the ocean for miles, until you awaken on the shores of an abandoned island, your only possession, a questionably large power bank that comes with a reliable cable as its charger. The terrain is filled with puzzles and hazards. Navigate the island until a towering lighthouse emerges. If you can power it up and send its beam towards the sea, you might catch the attention of a passing ship‚Ä¶ and earn your way home.

-Info-
This experience was created for the Inspire 2025 Challenge. In order to appeal to multiple DevRel communities, we added a ingame book UI with translations that explain all of the features of our power bank. Because of the diversity of our team, we managed to get translations into English, German, Romanian, French, and Spanish. All of our keybinds are also conveniently listed on the bottom left of your screen, their uses are in the Book Ui.

gameData.title: The One Paper
gameData.description:
üìú The One Paper. Legend says it is a primordial sheet of paper that has existed since the beginning of time. It gives life to what it folds into.

‚úÇÔ∏è But long long ago‚Ä¶ it got into the wrong hands. Julius Scissar cut the One Paper into 5 pieces with his scissors swords, and flew them away into eternity.

üíî One Paper's powers were gone... and it split into the 5 elements: üî• Fire, üíß Water, üåè Earth, üí® Air and üåå Space.

‚ú® Go on your journey as the reincarnated Paperman to gather all the pieces of the One Paper back, and to destroy Julius Scissar.

‚ö†Ô∏è Watch out for his Scissors... They still follow anyone who tries to bring back the One Paper.

Made under 86 hours for Roblox's Inspire 2025 GameJam
By @Qbytez, @ohnoLeoo, @xGhulo, @N4Animation, @QwinkleTee

gameData.title: Wizard Escapes Containment
gameData.description:
One night, when you were sleeping, 3 robots came to your home, kidnap, and raid your home while your still asleep.
You wake up in a shock, looking around and not recognizing the place, you question these robots, but not response, they claim you are "an anomaly" and need to be taken in for questioning. While they had no sight of you, you tried to break free with your wand, but you weren't able to.
As the robot heard all the banging and crashing they cam up to check on you, they knew you were trying to break out, so in return they took all 3 of you precious gems.
After waiting for nearly an hour, they take you to a waiting room and leave... you notice your wand is on the table.

Wizard Escapes Containment - Is a submission to the Roblox Inspire 2025 Game Jam and was made in 86 hours.

gameData.title: Master Caster
gameData.description:
üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüîÆüßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
As a grand wizard's body begins to wither with age, he finds himself in desperate need of a worthy successor. A worthy successor which he's naturally hoping to be his apprentice; if only he can prove himself worthy in one final trial by surmounting his master's tower.

In this puzzle game, use your one tool: the spellbook, to overcome adversity and all that lays in your path to greatness to become a dignified spellcaster.

gameData.title: Glitchbound
gameData.description:
Trapped inside a digital prison, players in Glitchbound take on the role of rebellious anomalies, desperate to shatter the simulation and break free. They exploit whatever they have at their disposal to try and break out from the system!

Issues? Just reset your character, it's just a glitch in the matrix!

So, if you somehow joined‚Ä¶ uh, you probably weren‚Äôt supposed to. And if I tell you to leave, please do. Seriously. I‚Äôve had to ban so many people already‚Ä¶

gameData.title: Beware Malware
gameData.description:
For the 2025 Developer Game Jam. Made in only 3 days.
Made by the one and only...
some nobodies!!!

You wake up into the world inside a computer. What purpose do you have? Well, to be a virus and do malicious things to your victims! But, maybe you can change?

gameData.title: Dewey Decimal Destruction
gameData.description:
Submission for 2025 game dev challenge

you're an angry old librarian who's had enough of the dewey decimal system and its strict rules. tired of the overdue fines and constant order, you decide to destroy the system by wrecking the library and its books. your task is to cause as much chaos as possible before the kids come back. good luck.

gameData.title: Chaos in the System
gameData.description:
My submission for the RDC 25 developer challenge.

You play as, well, not really anything.

Point and click your way, interacting with objects throughout
different maps with one goal in mind, to cause chaos in the system!

A short and sweet game.

gameData.title: RENEGADE
gameData.description:
üïπÔ∏è Made in under 72 hours for the 2025 Developer Challenge.

You're a dedicated teacher, but the system doesn‚Äôt reward dedication‚Äîit rewards connections. You've just been replaced, and now, during the final days of your job, you must break the system by breaking hiring traditions and punishing those rewarded through nepotism.

Sabotage the school, enroll delinquents, and set up your replacement for total failure. But be careful‚Äîpush too far, and you might be exposed.

Will you dismantle the injustice, or will you be consumed by the ever-flawed system?

gameData.title: GAMER RAGE
gameData.description:
After losing one (1) (not too many literally just one) round, you've decided you had enough and unleashed your inner beast. Thrash at your computer until it is nothing more than dust and shrapnel to show those skill-less gamers on the other side of your ethernet cable who's boss!

For Roblox's "Break the System" Developer Challenge 2025.

gameData.title: Corrupt
gameData.description:
üéÆ Solo Project for Roblox's 2025 DevRel Game Jam under the theme "Break the System" 

üïπ Controls are as followed: {
   R to Reload
   Q to toggle music
   LMB to fire weapon
   WASD for movement
}

You're a employee at a factory under a corrupted system, you've reached you're breaking point along with your other friends and you're all equipped with two guns to your aid. Kill the corrupted top-hatted businessmen and free the poor workers, break the system...

üì± Mobile is supported.
üëç Multiplayer is supported.

‚è≤ You have 5 Minutes to do your task.

To free the employees, go near a door to open it, if the door's other end is pitch black and if a businessman isn't in sight, the employees will proceed to walk outside through the exit. Do not kill the employees.

Due to my lack of knowledge on certain topics during the development process, this game has led on to be slightly scuffed. You may encounter several errors or bugs. Apologies...

gameData.title: Specter Endeavor
gameData.description:
Created for the Roblox Developer Challenge 2025 with the theme "Break the System."

A long-time friend of yours has taken your computer away and up to a sky-piercing tower. He wishes to break it, but you endeavor otherwise. Using your newfound spectral form, you must ascend your way to the top of the tower, surmounting any obstacles you may face. Use your trusty keyboard to break the system that stands in your way and save your system from being broken!

gameData.title: Hotfix
gameData.description:
Welcome to Hotfix, an all-new party game where the physics change every few seconds!

üí• Survive the madness as random hotfixes are applied to the testing environment
üõ†Ô∏è Adapt to new unpredictable game mechanics
üéØ Complete challenges to earn points
üèÜ Win solo or with a team - the choice is up to you!

‚ö†Ô∏è At least 2 players are required to play
üéÆ 24 player servers so you can easily compete against friends

üèÜ This game was constructed within a 3 day timeframe as part of the Roblox Developer Challenge 2025 game jam! üèÜ

Good luck and have fun!!

gameData.title: COMPLEX
gameData.description:
You wake up from what feels like a trance. You don't know where you are, you don't know where you're going. Will you really break the cycle, or are you another cog in the machine?

An immersive exploration, platformer & horror narrative experience made in just 3 days as a solo project.

Submission for the Roblox Developer Challenge 2025
https://devforum.roblox.com/t/3389448/222
Theme: "Break the system"

Visually inspired by "BLAME!" (manga) & NAISSANCEE (video game).

gameData.title: Recursion
gameData.description:
NOTICE: It seems that this game has a random glitch now that its uploaded that makes it impossible to play the game. Due to the rules of the challenge, I'm unable to go fix it. If you jump and don't hear the corresponding jump noise play or are unable to open the starting door, the only solution is to close roblox and restart the game until it works.

After an Urbex trip to the former White Valley Technologies testing facility goes wrong, you find yourself trapped in a realm that lies outside of the laws of physics. Will you manage to break the system, and escape the facility and its endless amount of infinitely looping hallways?

CONTROLS:
LSHIFT: Spin jump (Breaks orange boxes)
R: Interact with starting button, drag around Blue Boxes.
WASD: Move
Space: Jump

Made in 72 hours by myself for the Roblox Developer Challenge 2025

gameData.title: NETBANE
gameData.description:
[BREAK THE SYSTEM GAME JAM 2025]
Up to 5 Players take on the role of corporate malware and compete to infiltrate a supercompany's mainframe and steal the most DATA. 

Traverse at high speeds, avoid antiviral agents, and set traps for other Viruses to ensure that you come out on top.
The deeper you go, the more valuable the DATA, but be warned: THE FIREWALL has been triggered, and once it initiates, you won't have long to escape.

CONTROLS:
Jump: SPACE / (A)
Crouch + Slide: CTRL / C / (Y)
Fire Grapple: LEFTCLICK / (RIGHTTRIGGER)
Reel Grapple: HOLD LEFTCLICK / (HOLD RIGHTTRIGGER)
Detach Grapple: RIGHTCLICK / (LEFTTRIGGER)
Grapple Swing: W, A, S, D / (THUMBSTICK 1)

PC and Console are supported! (though Keyboard is recommended)

gameData.title: CRAZY Dodgeball! [V1]
gameData.description:
Welcome to CRAZY Dodgeball! Obtain the most POWERFUL ball and destroy the noobs. This game has hectic and fast-paced gameplay and many secrets to discover as well. Who knows what you might find?

How to play:
1. Hit players
2. Use your hits to upgrade your ball
3. Eventually get the best ball, the Spirit Ball!!

üó£Ô∏è Join the communications server for exclusive updates and üí∏ CODES üí∏! (there is actually a code you can use RIGHT NOW!)

UPDATE LOG V1:
- Fixed barious bugs
- Added 9 new balls
- Created Basement Map
- Improved aiming
- Performance optimizations
- Revamped various GUIs
- Added 3 new gamepasses
- Updated multipliers system
- The final data wipe

Crazy Dodgeball is a ball game where you battle people and slap them back by throwing your ball at them! Like a simulator!

gameData.title: Time Is Your Enemy Red Vs Blue FPS DevRel
gameData.description:
Step into the ultimate showdown in Time Is Your Enemy: Red Vs Blue! In this fast-paced first-person shooter, time is your greatest foe. Two teams, Red and Blue, face off in an intense battle where every second counts. Choose your side and strategize to outwit your opponents in thrilling, time-limited matches. Use a variety of weapons and power-ups to dominate the battlefield, but beware‚Äîtime will always be against you. Will you conquer the clock and lead your team to victory, or will time be your downfall? Jump into the action now and prove your skills!

TheGuyBesideYou3, chocoexistsyk, Dp3_p, P1xleated was here

gameData.title: Countdown
gameData.description:
Awakened in a facility far in the future, you must act fast to prevent a meltdown to save yourself and the facility.

Created in 72 hours for the Roblox Inspire 2024 game jam.

gameData.title: Timed Parkour (Timeless game!!)
gameData.description: Time Is Your Enemy!

gameData.title: The Nuclear Paradox
gameData.description:
You are a scientist who is attempting to stop a nuclear apocalypse from happening. In a last-ditch effort, you use an experimental backpack that lets you travel back in time, but only for a short period. Your mission is to go back in time and prevent the events that lead to the apocalypse. To do this, you must journey into the past. The backpack's power is limited, so you'll need to recharge it by finding energy sources scattered throughout the past. If you run out of power, time will start reversing, sending you back to the present and erasing all your progress. Every mistake brings the apocalypse closer. Can you beat the clock, change the past, and save the world? Or will time become your enemy?

(and yes, we made an original soundtrack for game jam lol)

Made for Inspire 2024

gameData.title: Modular Chaos (Developer Challenge 2024)
gameData.description:
Made in 48 hours for the Roblox Developer Challenge 2024 by GamersInternational, Ty_Scripts, trtman33, TmsDevv and eMisakie.

You are alone in a space station. Your job is to monitor various modules within it to keep it running smoothly. Report any unexpected developments unless you want to be terminated. Do not forget to leave your monitoring station to attend to your own command module. Good luck.

gameData.title: The WAR of Sendwich [Game Jam]
gameData.description:
Live Chuck & Jim's amazing journey to get their Sendwich back!

-- Team --
JohnRush07: Scripting, modelling, artist
theStarboot: Scripting, sound design, immoral support

-- Theme Explaination --
The theme of this game jam was unexpected development. Reading the theme we tought of two things: cartoons (ex. Regular Show) and Flash story games, thats why we made a web-comic style game where the story just develops degenerately (or unexpectedly) into a chaos of plot twists and missions.
